tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Embiid sinks tough and-1 jumper ) 2022/01/13 ESHEET

videos.description: LaMelo Ball steals a pass which leads to a Gordon Hayward dunk in the first quarter for the Hornets.

videos.headline: LaMelo steal leads to Hayward bucket

videos.description: Joel Embiid blows by his defender and finishes with finesse for the 76ers in the first quarter.

videos.headline: Embiid drops in pretty finger-roll layup
